OOC: Nothing like a bad pun to start the day.

::Cygnar::
       Another pod opens in the ship and a black bot steps out.  He was 
rather scrawny for a bot, but his size belied his fighting instincts.  He was 
a trained tactician, skilled in the arts of war.  He walks over to Galvatron 
not bothering to try and hide his thoughts as he glared at Empath.  "Lord 
Galvatron.  What is our situation?"

--part1_c8.298b5e42.2a5dad5e_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

--part1_c8.298b5e42.2a5dad5e_boundary--
